name: BetterthanTrueFacts
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: better than true facts
des: The line between fact and fiction is increasingly blurred. This skill crosses that line, sharing amazing, weird facts that are better than true. (All of these facts are made up, and any resemblance to the truth is coincidental.)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
